-- Test 1: Monthly pass \(28 days\), expired yesterday. No holidays in March.
-- Zuzanna Lewandowska: monthly_2x, Feb 1-28
UPDATE passes SET auto_renew = true, valid_from = ''2026-02-01'', valid_until = ''2026-02-21''
  WHERE id = ''8497b9aa-9d54-4b69-9058-2bce012ececd'';

-- Test 2: Monthly pass that would renew into April \(has Easter Mon Apr 6\)
-- Maja Kaminska: monthly_1x, set to expire Mar 31
UPDATE passes SET auto_renew = true, valid_from = ''2026-03-01'', valid_until = ''2026-02-21''
  WHERE id = ''719e89f0-dd6b-42fc-9839-451fb243aa83'';

-- Test 3: Single-entry pass already expired - should NOT be renewed \(auto_renew=false\)
-- Keep Olga Przybylska as-is \(single_entry, auto_renew=false\)

-- Test 4: Monthly pass with auto_renew=true expiring near May 1 \(Swieto Pracy\) + May 3
UPDATE passes SET auto_renew = true, valid_from = ''2026-04-01'', valid_until = ''2026-02-21''
  WHERE id = ''e0000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000025'';

SELECT ''Test passes prepared'' AS status;
")
